apigem.description: Led the complete redesign of Apigem's web application, focusing on modern UI/UX principles and responsive design to enhance user experience and accessibility

introduction.description: As a key developer on the Apigem project, I led the modernization of their web application used by medical clinics for patient and staff management. The project involved transforming a legacy system into a modern, responsive web application while maintaining seamless integration with their existing desktop solution.
introduction.introduction: Apigem Web serves as a critical tool for medical staff, enabling them to manage patient records, staff schedules, and appointments. My role focused on improving the application's usability and accessibility while ensuring robust integration with their existing systems.
introduction.name: Apigem Web
introduction.title: Apigem

group.intro: Led the transformation of the legacy system into a modern, maintainable architecture with improved performance and scalability.

1.title: Architecture Analysis and Planning
description: Conducted comprehensive analysis of the existing legacy system architecture
Identified performance bottlenecks in database queries and API calls
Planned the implementation of a modern MVC architecture with REST API endpoints
Designed a new database structure optimized for web application performance

2.title: Core System Implementation
description: Implemented a modular architecture using PHP namespaces and autoloading
Developed a REST API layer for seamless integration with the desktop application
Created an efficient caching system for frequently accessed data
Implemented secure authentication and session management

group.intro: Transformed the user interface into a modern, responsive design with improved usability and accessibility.

1.title: Responsive Design Implementation
description: Implemented Bootstrap 4 grid system for responsive layouts across all devices
Created custom CSS components for consistent styling and branding
Developed mobile-first design patterns for optimal user experience
Implemented touch-friendly controls for tablet and mobile users

2.title: Interactive Features Development
description: Developed real-time updates using AJAX and WebSocket technology
Implemented drag-and-drop functionality for appointment scheduling
Created dynamic form validation with instant feedback
Added keyboard shortcuts for power users

group.intro: Significantly improved application performance through various optimization techniques.

1.title: Database Optimization
description: Optimized database queries reducing response time by 60%
Implemented query caching for frequently accessed data
Created efficient indexing strategies for large datasets
Developed a data archiving system for historical records

2.title: Frontend Performance
description: Implemented lazy loading for images and content
Optimized JavaScript bundle size using code splitting
Created efficient DOM manipulation patterns
Implemented browser caching strategies

bubo.description: Led the modernization of a legacy PHP application to Symfony 4, implementing Material Design principles and advanced data visualization with ApexCharts

introduction.description: Led the complete modernization of a legacy PHP application, focusing on system architecture, user interface, and data visualization improvements
introduction.introduction: Modernized a legacy PHP application to meet current web standards and improve user experience
introduction.name: BUBO Cybsersec
introduction.title: BUBO

group.intro: Led the migration from a legacy PHP application to Symfony 4, focusing on performance optimization and architectural improvements.

1.title: Legacy to Symfony Migration
description: Conducted comprehensive analysis of performance bottlenecks and architectural limitations
Designed new database structure and Doctrine entities for optimal integration
Refactored PHP and JavaScript code for improved maintainability
Implemented modern development practices and coding standards

2.title: UI/UX Redesign
description: Led UI/UX redesign adopting Material Design principles
Selected and integrated UIkit via Yarn, customizing it for application needs
Utilized Webpack Encore for asset management and optimization
Designed consistent design system including horizontal navigation, custom components, and responsive dashboards

group.intro: Replaced legacy charting system with ApexCharts for modern and interactive data visualization.

1.title: Interactive Charts Implementation
description: Implemented charts with zoom functionality and export capabilities
Added real-time updates and dynamic filtering features
Created responsive and interactive data visualizations
Optimized chart performance for large datasets

group.intro: Integrated OpenVas for advanced vulnerability monitoring and implemented real-time security metrics.

1.title: Vulnerability Management
description: Developed real-time vulnerability data processing and analysis system
Designed robust database for historical vulnerability tracking
Created interactive dashboards with real-time security metrics
Implemented automated vulnerability assessment workflows

group.intro: Implemented dynamic data loading and AJAX updates for optimal performance.

1.title: Data Loading Optimization
description: Implemented dynamic data loading using KnpPaginator
Created efficient sorting and filtering mechanisms for large datasets
Optimized AJAX updates for real-time data refresh
Improved overall application response time and user experience

hml.description: Optimized and modernized Mediabase, a key export and data processing platform for book distributors, focusing on automation, reliability, and performance.

introduction.name: Harmonia Mundi Livre
introduction.introduction: As the lead developer for Mediabase, I was responsible for two major system improvements: optimizing the existing template-based export system and developing a new customized export system. The project aimed to enhance data processing efficiency and provide more flexible export capabilities for users.
introduction.description: I led both the optimization of the existing template system and the development of a new customized export system, focusing on performance improvements, user experience, and advanced export features.

group.intro: Optimized the existing template-based export system to significantly improve performance and reliability, focusing on the PDF generation process using FPDF.

performance.title: Performance Analysis and Optimization
description: Conducted thorough analysis of the existing template system's performance bottlenecks, particularly in the FPDF-based generation process
Identified and resolved memory management issues in PDF generation, where each element was being generated pixel-by-pixel
Implemented efficient data processing algorithms to handle large batches of PDF generation
Reduced PDF generation time from one day to approximately 20 minutes by implementing template-based generation

template.title: Template System Implementation
description: Developed a robust template engine using pre-filled files with static covers and shapes (Template F and Template G)
Created a flexible template management system that copies and modifies templates instead of generating from scratch
Implemented caching mechanisms for improved performance and reduced memory usage
Added support for various export formats and layouts, with automated notification system for completed exports

group.intro: Developed a new customized export system with advanced features and flexible configuration options, including dynamic field management and format selection.

fields.title: Dynamic Field Management
description: Implemented a dynamic field selection system with category-based organization and permission checks
Created a user-friendly interface for field configuration with drag-and-drop functionality
Added support for custom field formatting and validation, including number, text, and list types
Developed field dependency management system with automatic category hiding based on permissions

rights.title: Advanced Rights Management
description: Designed and implemented a granular permissions system for field access control
Created role-based access control for export features with field-level permissions
Developed export quota management system with usage tracking
Implemented audit logging for export operations with detailed user activity tracking

formats.title: Format Selection and Customization
description: Developed support for multiple export formats (PDF, Excel, CSV) with format-specific optimizations
Created format-specific configuration options with custom formatting rules
Implemented format validation and preview features with real-time updates
Added support for custom format templates with save and share capabilities

group.intro: Modernized the production environment to support both export systems efficiently, including migration to Ubuntu 22.04 and implementation of secure configurations.

infrastructure.title: System Analysis and Infrastructure Setup
description: Analyzed current infrastructure using Zend Framework, Docker for search library, and Samba for file sharing
Set up a modern production environment with Ubuntu 22.04 and optimized Apache configuration
Implemented secure configurations and access controls for application and file sharing
Created automated deployment and backup systems with comprehensive testing procedures

migration.title: System Migration and Integration
description: Planned and executed smooth migration of both export systems with zero downtime
Ensured data integrity during migration process with automated validation
Implemented monitoring and alerting systems for both export processes
Created comprehensive documentation for both systems including setup and maintenance procedures

hopps.description: Led the development and maintenance of AlertCenter, a comprehensive IT infrastructure monitoring platform that provides real-time insights and incident management capabilities

introduction.description: As a developer at Hopps Groupe, I worked on maintaining and enhancing their internal monitoring tools, particularly AlertCenter, which serves as a central platform for IT infrastructure monitoring and incident management.
introduction.introduction: AlertCenter is a critical tool used by the infrastructure department to monitor and manage IT systems. The platform integrates with various monitoring tools and provides real-time dashboards for incident tracking and escalation.
introduction.name: AlertCenter
introduction.title: Hopps Group

group.intro: Enhanced AlertCenter's capabilities as a central monitoring platform for IT infrastructure and incident management, focusing on real-time monitoring and efficient incident handling.

1.title: Monitoring Dashboard Development
description: Developed a centralized dashboard aggregating data from multiple infrastructure monitoring tools
Implemented real-time incident display with team-specific indicators and severity levels
Created a comprehensive incident history and log viewing system with advanced filtering
Added real-time metrics visualization with customizable time ranges

2.title: System Modernization
description: Modernized the codebase using object-oriented programming and MVC architecture
Implemented WebSocket technology for real-time data updates without polling
Enhanced webservice integrations for seamless data synchronization
Developed an advanced incident escalation system with SMS and call notifications based on criticality

group.intro: Successfully separated AlertCenter into two independent applications to support a client's separation from the main group, ensuring data isolation and maintaining functionality.

1.title: Multi-tenant Implementation
description: Designed and implemented a multi-tenant architecture for separate client environments
Developed request filtering system to maintain tool connectivity based on user accounts
Created a more efficient solution to handle client separation requirements
Implemented data isolation mechanisms to ensure client data privacy

2.title: Access Control System
description: Implemented account grouping with conditional filtering throughout the application
Developed cross-server request filtering to maintain tool connectivity
Created role-based access control with granular permissions
Conducted comprehensive unit testing before client deployment

group.intro: Created an efficient service center ticketing interface that bridges multiple systems and automates user management, significantly reducing manual intervention.

1.title: Service Desk Integration
description: Developed a web-based form for CDS to create Jira tickets efficiently
Implemented LDAP integration to pre-fill ticket information using personnel numbers
Created a seamless workflow for ticket creation and management
Added automated ticket categorization based on incident type

2.title: Identity Management
description: Built a bridge between two Active Directories and the Jira ticketing system
Implemented automatic Jira account creation for new users via Jira API
Developed a synchronization system for user roles and permissions
Created automated user provisioning and deprovisioning workflows

scf.description: Developed a comprehensive web platform for the French-speaking SC community, providing localized content, real-time updates, and community features as an alternative to the English official website

introduction.description: The game related to the site is under development, and all content is currently in English. We propose an alternative for the French-speaking community
introduction.introduction: Personal project to become an additional support for a community of 6000 users on a chat application (Discord)!
introduction.name: SC Francophone Web
introduction.title: SC Francophone

group.intro: Built a modern web platform using React and Node.js, focusing on performance, scalability, and real-time features for the French-speaking community.

1.title: Core Architecture Implementation
description: Developed a React-based frontend with server-side rendering for optimal performance
Implemented a Node.js backend with RESTful API endpoints
Created a MongoDB database structure optimized for content management
Set up Docker containers for consistent development and deployment

2.title: Real-time Features
description: Implemented WebSocket integration for real-time updates and notifications
Created a live chat system with Discord integration
Developed real-time content synchronization across multiple servers
Added push notifications for important community updates

group.intro: Developed an efficient content management system for handling game-related information and community content.

1.title: Data Integration
description: Created automated data scraping system for game updates and news
Implemented content translation pipeline for French localization
Developed caching system using Redis for improved performance
Built content validation and moderation tools

2.title: Community Features
description: Developed user profile system with Discord integration
Created community forums with real-time updates
Implemented content sharing and voting system
Added moderation tools for community management

group.intro: Implemented various optimization techniques to ensure fast loading times and smooth user experience.

1.title: Frontend Optimization
description: Implemented code splitting and lazy loading for faster initial load
Optimized image loading with WebP format and responsive images
Created efficient state management with Redux
Added service worker for offline functionality

2.title: Backend Optimization
description: Implemented database indexing for faster queries
Created efficient caching strategies with Redis
Developed load balancing for multiple servers
Added monitoring and logging for performance tracking
